verbs.description: [V: antarctica] [ARG1: monster iceberg] is still alive 1 year after its birth one year after breaking off from antarctica the continent sixth - largest iceberg in recorded history is still floating in the open ocean iceberg a-68 weighs about 1 trillion tons is about the size of maryland and broke off the larsen ice shelf in july 2017 relatively little of it has melted a68 swansea university project midas bawden ice rise antarctica nasa antarctic peninsula south georgia iceberg adrian luckman weddell sea
